participant_1.background:
I bought my first guitar when I was 14 years old.
i try to limit how much i eat.
I broke my arm when I was a child, but it healed well.
I wish my car wasn't acting up so I could get to my music lesson on time.
i am a competitive ski racer.

participant_2.background:
My most valuable possession is my Tigers baseball jersey.
I celebrated my birthday by going on a horseback riding trip.
I take care of my health because I want to live a long life to see my children grow up.
I write about my travels and experiences.
I went to the beach and relaxed.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you doing today?
I'm doing pretty well, thanks! I'm just trying to get my car fixed so I can get to my music lesson on time.
Oh no, that's not good. I hope it gets fixed soon!
Me too! I'm actually a competitive ski racer, and I need my car to get to and from practices and competitions.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to try skiing, but I've never gotten the chance.
You should! It's a lot of fun, and it's a great way to stay in shape.
I will have to look into it! I've been wanting to try something new.
That's great! I'm sure you'll love it.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to write about my travels and experiences. I also like to go horseback riding.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to go horseback riding.
It's a lot of fun! You should definitely try it sometime.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
